2.a: All sides of a scalene triangle are different in both angles and length
2.c: c) All the sides of a scalene triangle are the same but the angles are different.
2.d: d) All angles of a scalene triangle are different but all the sides are the same length
2.q: 2) What are the properties of a scalene triangle?
